department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Marine Procurement Outlook Presentations November 2022 французскими объявлением о тендерной примерные колебаний
description: Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC), with the support of the Department of National Defence (DND), Department of Fisheries and Ocean (DFO) and Canadian Coast Guard (CCG), and Transport Canada (TC) presented a hybrid National Marine Procurement Outlook at the annual Business Opportunities conference hosted by the Association of British Columbia Marine Industries (ABCMI) on Wednesday, November 9, 2022 in Vancouver, BC. Participating departments provided an overview of upcoming procurements in areas such as small and large vessel construction, vessel repair, refit and life extension, in-service support and sustainment. In addition, PSPC presented an Introduction to Social Procurement.The Master presentation has been uploaded to this posting for your review.
full_summary:
### Marine Procurement Outlook Presentations
#### Tender Number: PW-22-01018573
#### Publication Date: December 23, 2022
#### Tender Closing Date: December 23, 2024, 13:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time)

The Canadian government, through the Public Works and Government Services Canada, is seeking to inform potential bidders of upcoming marine procurement opportunities. On November 9, 2022, a hybrid National Marine Procurement Outlook was presented at the annual Business Opportunities conference hosted by the Association of British Columbia Marine Industries. The presentation provided an overview of upcoming procurements in areas such as:

* Small and large vessel construction
* Vessel repair, refit, and life extension
* In-service support and sustainment

Additionally, an introduction to Social Procurement was presented.

The presentation is available for review, and this posting includes details on how to obtain the document. 

#### Tender Information
* Tender Reference Number: PW-22-01018573
* Tender Title: Marine Procurement Outlook Presentations November 2022
* Solicitation Number: OUTLOOKNOV2022

#### Tenders Requirements
* The tender is an open bidding process, and interested parties are invited to submit their proposals.

#### Reference Documents
* Master presentation can be found in the attachments section of this posting
* English Version: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/23/9c0033f401ce393eb7eba8929bc91fe0/master_deck_outlook_nov.9_2022_engl.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/23/9c0033f401ce393eb7eba8929bc91fe0/master_deck_outlook_nov.9_2022_engl.pdf)
* French Version: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/23/8c19abe53b68bdb27801c0a0552817bd/master_deck_outlook_nov.9_2022_french.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/23/8c19abe53b68bdb27801c0a0552817bd/master_deck_outlook_nov.9_2022_french.pdf)
